Sunglasses.Name: Blue
Sunglasses.Description: Elevate your style and shield your eyes with these sleek and sophisticated sunglasses, featuring a captivating blue tint that adds a touch of cool elegance to any look.

Sunglasses.Name: Classic
Sunglasses.Description: An embodiment of timeless elegance and modern flair. These sunglasses are a celebration of style and sophistication,featuring exquisite circular lenses and a luxurious gold frame that exudes opulence.

Sunglasses.Name: Murray
Sunglasses.Description: Embrace the warmth of the sun with these sunglasses featuring a lightweight plastic frame and lenses tinted in a bold and energetic shade of orange.

Sunglasses.Name: Red
Sunglasses.Description: Elevate your style with these sunglasses featuring a sleek and slender metal frame, perfectly complemented by lenses tinted in a striking shade of red.
